title: Devoleena Bhattacharjee:'Bahu Bani Chudail'! Fans Lash Out At Bigg Boss 13 Housemate Devoleena Bhattacharjee For Aggressive Behaviour
text:
Unlike the previous season, this year, Bigg Boss 13 is a little different from the other season. The finale will take place in just four weeks. And in yesterday’s episode, the Bigg Boss House turned into a Toy Factory for its Ticket To Finale Task.

Twitter

The contestants were divided into two teams. The first team, Siddharth Shukla’s team had Shehnaaz, Shefali, Arti and Asim. The second team, Paras Chhabra's team had Devoleena, Rashami, Mahira and Siddhartha Dey.

Twitter

Everybody did whatever they could for this was the task that could earn them a ticket to finale. However, Devoleena Bhattacharjee’s aggressive behaviour during the task didn’t somewhat go down well with the fans.

Don't Miss 206 SHARES 6.7 K SHARES 218 SHARES 406 SHARES 9.6 K SHARES

Twitter

She has also had fights with Asim Riaz and Shehnaaz Gill. She even tol Asim, 'roti ki jagah, potty khata hai kya'. The loved Bahu of TV shows, even got into a physical fight with Shefali Bagga in the previous nomination task.

This apparently hasn’t got down well with some fans.

Haan, mujhe bhi laga tha. What a potty mouthed lady. #DevoleenaBhattacharjee 🙄🙄 — MB (@MithiMirchi10) October 15, 2019

Bahu bani babe, babe bani chudail aur chudail bani devolina #BB13 — Wasim akram (@akramwasim98) October 15, 2019

Ye queen ki achi dadagiri hai.. chirkut bhaut bolne lagi achanak #DevoleenaBhattacharjee 😅 #BiggBoss13 — 1ta (@ektathakur03) October 15, 2019

#Asim fans never do guchu puchu like #DevoleenaBhattacharjee and her chugli gang are doing inside the house. No wonder koi v iss baar nahi jitega unme se. — Simba 🦁 (@timmonandpumbaa) October 15, 2019

Serial ki do bahuyon ka asli rang dikh gya bigg boss me.. I hate both of them #DevoleenaBhattacharjee nd #RashamiDesai — shalini singh (@Singhshalu7) October 15, 2019

I think #DevoleenaBhattacharjee has some serious issues with "muh"

"Muh mat lagna uss ladki ki"

"Har ek gang mein muh marti hain aap"

She is such a c grade loafer.

Loved the way #SidharthShukla

consoled this sadak chap topi bahu, even after her nautanki.#BB13 #BiggBoss13 — Tinni Bose (@TinniBose2) October 15, 2019

#DevoleenaBhattacharjee to #ShehnazGill :

"Sabke bich me muh marna zaroori hai, tujhe bola kisi ne"

After few seconds #DevoleenaBhattacharjee

: "Baat krne ki toh taamiz hai nhi isko" 🙄😂

Is she talking abt herself? 🙄🤔#BB13 #BiggBoss13 #BiggBoss — Fiz 💕|| Hαppiest bday sanchit 😌❤ (@ImSfizzaa) October 15, 2019

Who is your favourite contestant on Bigg Boss 13? Let us know in the comment section below.
